item.title: Why Amazon’s Prime Day May Be the Catalyst for a Year-End Rally
item.description: Prime Day momentum, bullish analyst calls, and improving technicals suggest Amazon could shortly be breaking through $240 and rallying into year-end.

item.title: Let the Good Times Roll: 2 Stocks Showing No Signs of Slowing
item.description: Two overlooked companies that have nonetheless staged massive rallies in recent months may merit further consideration by momentum-focused investors.

item.title: Café Culture Revival? 3 Stocks to Watch After Chick-fil-A’s Move
item.description: Chick-fil-A’s new Daybright café concept could reignite interest in beverage-driven dining; here are three restaurant stocks investors should watch

item.title: Carmakers Step in With Incentives as EV Tax Credit Expires
item.description: As the federal government ends its EV tax credit, legacy automakers have moved to offer their own incentives to keep EV sales rolling.

item.title: Buy the Dip? Zillow’s Profit Comeback Meets Market Pressure
item.description: Zillow stock faces pressure from an FTC lawsuit despite strong mortgage growth and a return to profitability for the first time in over a decade
